void Prey::setBehaviorState ( const BehaviorState &  state  )  [virtual]

Thismethod changes the current behavioral state of the Prey.

This method also notifies the PreyManager if an actual state change occurs.

Parameters:
state The BehaviorState to set the Prey to, what the new State actually does depends on the PreyBehaviorFmily in use.
